# Security Policy

## Supported Versions
BayKo&ccedil; has not had a formal release yet. Only the dev branch currently receives security updates.

| Branch     | Supported          |
|-----------:|--------------------|
| dev        | yes                |
| production | no                 |

## Reporting a Vulnerability
- Please email tarikanafarta@hotmail.com with details.
- Alternatively, use the private advisory form: https://github.com/TarikAnafarta/BayKoc/security/advisories/new
- Do not report security issues via public GitHub issues or discussions.

### What to include
- Affected versions/branch and environment
- Steps to reproduce or PoC
- Impact assessment (e.g., data exposure, RCE, DoS)
- Suggested fix or mitigation (if known)

### Response Timeline
- Acknowledgment: within 72 hours
- Initial assessment: within 7 days
- Patch or mitigation: targeted within 30 days (critical issues prioritized sooner)

### Disclosure
Once a fix is available and users have had reasonable time to update, we may publish details via release notes and a security advisory.

### PGP key
We do not currently publish a PGP public key.
